subject: Not the best box, but it works.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
This will be hard to hear, it's not made of the usual bits of words, just
mostly out of noise. I can use/do anything else, but tobacco is absolutely
forbidden. This was a result of thinking last night that as much second hand
smoke as I have to endure, I might as well smoke.

F-S
